pre_text_caption_evidence: notes to consolidated financial statements jpmorgan chase & co./2009 annual report 168 nonrecurring fair value changes the following table presents the total change in value of financial instruments for which a fair value adjustment has been included in the consolidated statements of income for the years ended december 31 , 2009 , 2008 and 2007 , related to financial instru- ments held at these dates .
original_metadata.question: considering the year 2008 , what is the percentage of loans held-for-sale in total loans?
